title: Photography: how it works
brief_description: Animated film designed to introduce the basics of photography. Explains the relatinship between lens openings and shutter speeds, the way automatic cameras adjust to various light conditions and concepts such as depth of field. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
